overview: Hired to enact revenge on a man who savagely beat a beautiful Russian d√©butant, Jack Verlaine is pressed between his newly acquired job and a persistent man named, Brill, who offers him a chance to advance higher in his seedy career. But when an estranged lover reappears in Verlaine's regimented existence, he soon realizes the new elements in his life may be just a plot to uncover his true identity.
tagline: To kill is easy. To live is difficult.
title: Crosshairs
